description: Northern Minerals issued an announcement earlier today warning that it suffered a cybersecurity breach resulting in some of its stolen data being published on the dark web. [...]
title: Australian mining company discloses breach after BianLian leaks data

description: Over the past week, attackers have hijacked high-profile TikTok accounts belonging to multiple companies and celebrities, exploiting a zero-day vulnerability in the social media's direct messages feature. [...]
title: TikTok fixes zero-day bug used to hijack high-profile accounts

description: Today, the FBI issued a warning about scammers using fake remote job ads to steal cryptocurrency from job seekers across the United States while posing as recruiters for legitimate companies. [...]
title: FBI warns of fake remote work ads used for cryptocurrency fraud

description: American Radio Relay League (ARRL) has shared more information about a May cyberattack that took its Logbook of the World offline and caused some members to become frustrated over the lack of information. [...]
title: ARRL says it was hacked by an "international cyber group"

description: Microsoft has reopened the Windows 10 beta channel and is asking Insiders to join or switch to receive a new beta build in the coming weeks. [...]
title: Microsoft announces first Windows 10 Beta build since 2021

description: Cybercriminals are promoting a new phishing kit named 'V3B' on Telegram, which currently targets customers of 54 major financial institutes in Ireland, the Netherlands, Finland, Austria, Germany, France, Belgium, Greece, Luxembourg, and Italy. [...]
title: New V3B phishing kit targets customers of 54 European banks

description: Zyxel Networks has released an emergency security update to address three critical vulnerabilities impacting older NAS devices that have reached end-of-life. [...]
title: Zyxel issues emergency RCE patch for end-of-life NAS devices

description: A ransomware attack affecting pathology and diagnostic services provider Synnovis has impacted healthcare services at multiple major NHS hospitals in London. [...]
title: Major London hospitals disrupted by Synnovis ransomware attack

description: Microsoft has officially deprecated NTLM authentication on Windows and Windows servers, stating that developers should transition to Kerberos or Negotiation authentication to prevent problems in the future. [...]
title: Microsoft deprecates Windows NTLM authentication protocol
